Projects.name: Sound Effects
Projects.description: This project allows you to record your voice and apply various effects (reverb, delay, chorus, distortion). You can also download and save the processed audio.

Projects.name: Drum Machine
Projects.description: An interactive drum machine that lets you create rhythms using various drum sounds. Its user-friendly interface allows you to quickly build beats.

Projects.name: Audio Editor
Projects.description: A mini audio editor that enables you to edit audio files and perform various manipulations. It offers easy-to-use and effective editing tools.
